site.name: InterTrader
site.tagline: Buy & sell your crypto at the best price
site.description: InterTrader allows you to compare the price of the same coin across multiple exchanges simultaneously. It highlights price differences and opportunities to use the them to your advantage.
site.postSyncCommand: ssh lambomoon 'cd /var/www/intertrader-content && git reset --hard && git pull && chmod -R 755 ../intertrader-content'
